What is your shipping time?: Our shipping time is 3-5 business days.
What payment methods do you accept?: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and Cash on Delivery.
Can I track my order?: Yes, once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking link via email.
How can I cancel my order?: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours of placing them. Please contact support.
Do you offer free shipping?: We offer free shipping on all orders above $50.
What is your return policy?: You can return any unused product within 14 days for a full refund.
Do you offer product warranty?: Yes, all our electronic products come with a 1-year warranty.
How do I create an account?: Click on the 'Sign Up' button at the top right corner and fill in your details.
I forgot my password, what should I do?: Click on 'Forgot Password' and follow the instructions to reset it.
Can I change my delivery address after p: Yes, you can update your address before the order is shipped by contacting support.
Do you have a physical store?: Yes, we have showrooms in Karachi, Lahore, and Islamabad.
Are your products original?: Yes, we only sell 100% authentic and branded products.
How do I contact customer support?: You can reach us via live chat, email at support@example.com, or call +92-300-1234567.
Do you offer discounts?: Yes, we frequently run promotions and seasonal discounts. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated.
Can I pay with cash on delivery?: Yes, Cash on Delivery is available in major cities.
What currencies do you accept?: We currently accept payments in PKR, USD, and EUR.
Do you sell refurbished items?: No, we only sell brand new products.
Is my personal information safe?: Yes, we use SSL encryption and never share your data with third parties.
How long does international delivery tak: International shipping usually takes 10-15 business days.
